item.title: 美国对中国船只征收数十亿美元税款可能带来 "贸易启示录 "风险
item.description:
批评人士将在周一的听证会上指出，针对商船的举措可能比特朗普的关税更具破坏性。【原文：

Critics will tell a hearing on Monday that the move against commercial ships could be more disruptive for global trade than Trump’s tariffs.

】

item.title: 土耳其禁止卖空，放松回购以遏制市场下滑
item.description: 土耳其资本市场监管机构禁止所有股票卖空，并放宽了股票回购规定，以防止市场进一步恶化。一名著名反对派领导人被拘留后，土耳其基准指数暴跌 17%。【原文：Turkey’s capital markets regulator imposed a ban on short-selling across all stocks and relaxed share buyback rules in a bid to prevent further deterioration of the market, which saw the country’s benchmark index tumble 17% following the detention of a prominent opposition leader.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 本周在瑞士举行的英国《金融时报》全球大宗商品峰会将就能源转型以及从石油到矿产的所有相关问题展开讨论。德国制造商对欧洲天然气储存计划发表了看法。此外，咖啡也不会很快变得便宜。【原文：Panels on the energy transition and all things related, from oil to minerals, kick off the Financial Times Commodities Global Summit this week in Switzerland. German manufacturers weigh in on gas storage plans in Europe. And, coffee is not expected to get cheaper any time soon.】

item.title: James Hardie 同意以 87.5 亿美元收购 AZEK
item.description: 建材公司 James Hardie Industries 已同意以 87.5 亿美元的价格收购户外生活产品制造商 AZEK。【原文：Building materials company James Hardie Industries has agreed to buy AZEK, a maker of outdoor living products, in an $8.75 billion deal.】

item.title: 澳元将因澳大利亚央行立场和中国支持而扭转跌势
item.description: 澳元可能会迎来自 2020 年以来的首次年度上涨，因为央行将利率维持在高位，而经济也将受益于预期中的中国刺激政策。【原文：The Australian dollar may be headed for its first annual gain since 2020, as the central bank keeps interest rates high and the economy benefits from expected Chinese stimulus.】

item.title: 不要与贝森特的财政部作对 "是美国债券市场的新口号
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）一直在谈论 10 年期债券收益率。在演讲中，在采访中，他周而复始地陈述和重申政府的计划，即压低并保持收益率。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent can’t stop talking about 10-year bond yields. In speeches, in interviews, week after week, he states and restates the administration’s plan to push them down and keep them down.】

item.title: 债券市场期待通胀数据支持收益率曲线走高
item.description: 由于预期经济增长放缓和通胀加快，债券投资者正在向国债市场打入楔子，刺激了对收益率不断走低的短期国债的需求，而长期国债收益率则不断走高。下一个考验即将到来，周五的数据预计将显示通胀依然高企。【原文：Bond investors are driving a wedge into the Treasury market in anticipation of slower economic growth and faster inflation, spurring demand for shorter-term Treasuries at ever-lower yields while longer-term yields drift higher. The next test comes with Friday data expected to show inflation remains elevated.】

item.title: 铜牛预测创下史上最赚钱交易新纪录
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁征收关税导致全球股市下跌，并创造了他所认为的前所未有的交易获利机会，因此最受瞩目的铜价多头之一又开始预测新的价格纪录。【原文：One of the highest-profile copper bulls is back predicting new price records, as Donald Trump’s threat of tariffs drains global stocks and creates what he sees as unprecedented opportunities for trading profit.】

item.title: 拯救澳航只是开始，新任首席执行官承诺未来将有更多举措
item.description: 凡妮莎-赫德森（Vanessa Hudson）执掌澳航的时机可谓恰到好处。【原文：Vanessa Hudson could hardly have taken the helm of Qantas Airways Ltd. at a worse time.】

item.title: 波兰可再生能源产量增长，电价创历史新低
item.description: 由于越来越多的太阳能电池板和风力发电场提供了充足的电力供应，波兰上周末的电价创下了历史新低。【原文：Poland saw record low electricity prices over the weekend due to abundant supply from the growing number of solar panels and wind farms, demonstrating the challenges posed by intermittent sources to the stabilization of the country’s grid.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，特朗普政府有意将房利美和房地美私有化
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，特朗普政府正在考虑一项有关住房问题的行政命令，可能会推动住房贷款巨头房利美和房地美私有化。【原文：The Trump administration is considering an executive order on housing that may push for the privatization of home loan giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 白雪公主》翻拍版饱受争议，票房达 4300 万美元
item.description: 华特-迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.）对 1937 年经典动画《白雪公主》（Snow White）进行了现代翻拍，在褒贬不一的评论和铺天盖地的负面报道中，该片的周末票房未达到预期。【原文：Snow White, Walt Disney Co.’s modern-day remake of the 1937 animated classic, opened to weekend sales that missed box-office forecasts, amid mixed reviews and a blizzard of negative publicity.】

item.title: 基辅国防部长称乌克兰与美国将在利雅得举行会谈
item.description: 乌克兰国防部长鲁斯特姆-乌梅罗夫（Rustem Umerov）在 Facebook 上说，乌克兰和美国官员在利雅得举行的会谈于周日下午开始，这是结束俄罗斯对其邻国长达三年入侵的努力的一部分。【原文：Talks in Riyadh between Ukrainian and US officials, part of an effort to end Russia’s three-year invasion of its neighbor, started on Sunday afternoon, Rustem Umerov, Ukraine’s defense minister, said on Facebook.】

item.title: 期权市场关注就业和通胀而非关税问题
item.description: 虽然投资者对唐纳德-特朗普 4 月 2 日的关税 "解放日 "虎视眈眈，但期权市场显示，这远非日程表上的唯一事件。【原文：While investors are eyeing warily Donald Trump’s tariff “Liberation Day” on April 2, options markets show it’s far from the only event on the calendar.】

item.title: 尼日利亚天然气管道在紧急状态下发生火灾
item.description: 尼日利亚河流州的一条天然气管道一夜之间起火，这是这个石油资源丰富、处于紧急状态的地区一周内发生的第三起设施事故。【原文：A gas pipeline caught fire overnight in Nigeria’s Rivers State, the third incident in a week at facilities in an oil-rich region that’s under emergency rule.】

item.title: 咖啡制造商押宝低价— 他们错了
item.description: 咖啡烘焙商押注价格下降，选择放弃套期保值。现在，消费者将为此付出代价。【原文：Coffee roasters that were betting on lower prices opted out of hedging. Now consumers will pay the price.】

item.title: 寻求新兴市场新领域的投资者将全球风险转为本地风险
item.description: 新兴市场本币债券的涨势越来越异乎寻常，因为投资者试图通过更深入地投资鲜为人知的前沿国家来规避美国引发的风险。【原文：The rally in emerging-market local-currency bonds is getting more exotic, as investors seek to shield themselves from US-induced risks by venturing deeper into lesser-known frontier nations.】

item.title: 苹果正努力将手表打造成带摄像头的人工智能设备
item.description: 苹果公司正在探索为其智能手表添加摄像头和视觉智能功能的想法，这将推动该公司进入人工智能可穿戴设备市场。此外：苹果公司在 Siri 风波后对高管进行了重大调整，而欧盟正在大力推动开放 iOS 系统。【原文：Apple is exploring the idea of adding cameras and visual intelligence features to its smartwatch, thrusting the company into the AI wearables market. Also: Apple makes major executive changes following its Siri struggles, while the EU is pushing hard to open up iOS.】

item.title: 跌跌撞撞的股市引发了 Dot-Com 时代末日的阴影
item.description: 一项革命性的新技术出现了，其看似无限的可能性令投资者着迷。狂热引发了股市上涨。最终，情况变得过热，股价变得离谱。然后，一切都崩溃了。【原文：A revolutionary new technology comes along and infatuates investors with its seemingly limitless possibilities. Euphoria sparks a stock market rally. Eventually things get overheated and share prices become ridiculous. Then it all collapses.】

item.title: 意大利电信正在商讨修改贷款机制，Messaggero 称
item.description: 据《Il Messaggero》报周日报道，意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）正在与一组贷款人就修改高达 30 亿欧元（32.5 亿美元）的贷款机制进行谈判。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA is in negotiations with a group of lenders over the amendment of a loan facility of as much as €3 billion ($3.25 billion), newspaper Il Messaggero reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 星期日邮报》称津巴布韦寻求赞助商帮助清偿欠款
item.description: 据《星期日邮报》报道，津巴布韦正在寻求可能的赞助商，以提供技术支持、担保和资金，清偿对国际债权人的欠款。【原文：Zimbabwe is seeking possible sponsors to provide technical support, guarantees and funding for clearing its arrears with international creditors, the Sunday Mail reported.】

item.title: 里夫斯称英国将在重要讲话前裁减 1 万个公务员职位
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在周三的公共财政重要声明发布前表示，英国政府将致力于削减 10,000 名公务员。【原文：The UK government will aim to slash the number of civil servants by 10,000, Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said ahead of Wednesday’s key statement on the public finances.】

item.title: 土耳其央行将与贷款人会面讨论市场动荡问题
item.description: 据直接了解此事的人士透露，土耳其央行官员将于周日与商业贷款机构的高管会面，而一名重要的反对派政治家被捕引发了市场波动。【原文：Turkish central bank officials will meet with commercial lenders’ executives on Sunday amid market volatility triggered by the arrest of a key opposition politician, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲大宗交易迎来本世纪最佳开局
item.description: 今年对欧洲股票出乎意料的需求有助于推动该地区本世纪最大规模的整批出售浪潮，银行家们预计未来还会有更多交易。【原文：This year’s unexpected demand for European stocks is helping to drive the region’s largest wave of block sales this century, with bankers anticipating more deals ahead.】

item.title: 土耳其监禁埃尔多安的头号劲敌伊马莫格鲁，可能引发更多骚乱
item.description: 土耳其一家法院周日正式逮捕了总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安的头号政治对手，这一决定可能会激起更多抗议活动，并使当地市场在紧张局势加剧时继续承压。【原文：A Turkish court on Sunday formally arrested President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s top political rival, in a decision likely to stoke further protests and keep local markets under pressure as tensions mount.】

item.title: 莱维镇新西兰人打击全球骚扰网络
item.description:
在第三集中，新西兰的网络骚扰浪潮将调查人员引向了一个令人不安的网站。【原文：

In episode three, a wave of online harassment in New Zealand leads investigators to a troubling website — the same one whose users targeted the Levittown women.

】

item.title: 列维敦 E3：猎人（播客）
item.description: 列维敦 E3：猎人（播客）【原文：Levittown E3: The Hunter (Podcast)】

item.title: 美国即将加征关税，中国称已做好应对更大冲击的准备
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强表示，在全球为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下月宣布对其贸易伙伴征收更多关税做好准备之际，中国已做好应对 "超出预期的冲击 "的准备。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang said the country is prepared for “shocks that exceed expectations” as the world braces for US President Donald Trump to announce more tariffs on its trading partners next month.】

item.title: 里夫斯在春季声明中排除了提高税收的可能性
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）已排除在下周的春季声明中提高税收的可能性。【原文：Rachel Reeves has ruled out raising taxes in next week's Spring Statement.】

item.title: 万亿美元印度航线考验忠诚零售商的决心
item.description: 印度 1.2 万亿美元的股票大跌开始让散户投资者担忧，在全球资金外流的情况下，散户投资者几个月来一直在支持印度市场。【原文：India’s $1.2 trillion equity rout is starting to worry its legions of retail investors who have supported the market for months amid an exodus of global funds.】
